column1: Local Foods////While the salmon bagel sandwich appears small
column2: it's quite filling and delicious.  Salmon
column4: and greens - a combination that can't really go wrong.  It went really well on top of the poppy seed bagel
column5: which added a sort of crunch and substance to the otherwise light sandwich.  For my sides I got the quinoa and slaw
column8: and delicious.  Also got a chance to try their homemade chips
column9: which were phenomenal!  Definitely give them a try if you have the chance.
